verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David בְּשַׁנּוֹת֣וֹ <WH8138> when he changed אֶת־ <WH853> טַ֭עְמוֹ <WH2940> his behaviour לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech וַֽ֝יְגָרֲשֵׁ֗הוּ <WH1644> who drove him away וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ <WH1980> along אֲבָרֲכָ֣ה <WH1288> I will bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֑ת <WH6256> at all times תָּ֝מִ֗יד <WH8548> [shall] continually תְּֽהִלָּת֥וֹ <WH8416> his praise בְּפִֽי׃ <WH6310> [be] in my mouth

בַּ֭יהוָה <WH3068> in the LORD תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> shall make her boast נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> My soul יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shall hear עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6035> the humble וְיִשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <WH8055> [thereof] and be glad
גַּדְּל֣וּ <WH1431> O magnify לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אִתִּ֑י <WH854> for וּנְרוֹמְמָ֖ה <WH7311> with me and let us exalt שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> his name יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

דָּרַ֣שְׁתִּי <WH1875> I sought אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעָנָ֑נִי <WH6030> and he heard וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> all מְ֝גוּרוֹתַ֗י <WH4035> me from all my fears הִצִּילָֽנִי׃ <WH5337> me and delivered

הִבִּ֣יטוּ <WH5027> They looked אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> to him וְנָהָ֑רוּ <WH5102> unto him and were lightened וּ֝פְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> and their faces אַל־ <WH408> will never יֶחְפָּֽרוּ׃ <WH2659> were not ashamed

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This עָנִ֣י <WH6041> This poor man קָ֭רָא <WH7121> cried וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD שָׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> heard וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all צָ֝רוֹתָ֗יו <WH6869> him out of all his troubles הוֹשִׁיעֽוֹ׃ <WH3467> [him] and saved
חֹנֶ֤ה <WH2583> encampeth מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> The angel יְהוָ֓ה <WH3068> of the LORD סָ֘בִ֤יב <WH5439> round about לִֽירֵאָ֗יו <WH3373> them that fear וַֽיְחַלְּצֵֽם׃ <WH2502> him and delivereth

טַעֲמ֣וּ <WH2938> O taste וּ֭רְאוּ <WH7200> and see כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that the LORD אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> blessed הַ֝גֶּ֗בֶר <WH1397> [is] the man יֶחֱסֶה־ <WH2620> [that] trusteth בּֽוֹ׃

יְר֣אוּ <WH3372> O fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD קְדֹשָׁ֑יו <WH6918> ye his saints כִּי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מַ֝חְס֗וֹר <WH4270> for [there is] no want לִירֵאָֽיו׃ <WH3373> to them that fear

כְּ֭פִירִים <WH3715> The young lions רָשׁ֣וּ <WH7326> do lack וְרָעֵ֑בוּ <WH7456> and suffer hunger וְדֹרְשֵׁ֥י <WH1875> but they that seek יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not be in יַחְסְר֥וּ <WH2637> shall not want כָל־ <WH3605> of any טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> any good
לְֽכוּ־ <WH1980> Come בָ֭נִים <WH1121> ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> hearken לִ֑י יִֽרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> you the fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲלַמֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3925> unto me I will teach

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הָ֭אִישׁ <WH376> What man הֶחָפֵ֣ץ <WH2655> [is he that] desireth חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> life אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> [and] loveth יָ֝מִ֗ים <WH3117> [many] days לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> that he may see טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good
נְצֹ֣ר <WH5341> Keep לְשׁוֹנְךָ֣ <WH3956> thy tongue מֵרָ֑ע <WH7451> from evil וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ <WH8193> and thy lips מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> from speaking מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> guile
ס֣וּר <WH5493> Depart מֵ֭רָע <WH7451> from evil וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do ט֑וֹב <WH2896> good בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> seek שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> peace וְרָדְפֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7291> and pursue

עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> The eyes יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> are toward צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> [are] upon the righteous וְ֝אָזְנָ֗יו <WH241> and his ears אֶל־ <WH413> are toward שַׁוְעָתָֽם׃ <WH7775> [are open] unto their cry

פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> The face יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעֹ֣שֵׂי <WH6213> [is] against them that do רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil לְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> to cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <WH2143> the remembrance

צָעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> [The righteous] cry וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD שָׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> heareth וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all צָ֝רוֹתָ֗ם <WH6869> them out of all their troubles הִצִּילָֽם׃ <WH5337> and delivereth

קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <WH7665> unto them that are of a broken לֵ֑ב <WH3820> heart וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> דַּכְּאֵי־ <WH1793> such as be of a contrite ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and saveth
רַ֭בּוֹת <WH7227> Many רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> [are] the afflictions צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the righteous וּ֝מִכֻּלָּ֗ם <WH3605> all יַצִּילֶ֥נּוּ <WH5337> delivereth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> but the LORD
שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> He keepeth כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַצְמוֹתָ֑יו <WH6106> all his bones אַחַ֥ת <WH259> not one מֵ֝הֵ֗נָּה <WH2007> of them לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נִשְׁבָּֽרָה׃ <WH7665> is broken
תְּמוֹתֵ֣ת <WH4191> shall slay רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> the wicked רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> Evil וְשֹׂנְאֵ֖י <WH8130> and they that hate צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> the righteous יֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <WH816> shall be desolate

פּוֹדֶ֣ה <WH6299> redeemeth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> of his servants וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֶ֝אְשְׁמ֗וּ <WH816> in him shall be desolate כָּֽל־ <WH3605> who הַחֹסִ֥ים <WH2620> and none of them that trust בּֽוֹ׃
